Title: NHRC moves to end human rights abuses in airline operations
Summary: National Human Rights Commission (NHRC) has called for a comprehensive legal overhaul of Nigeria’s airline operations . This was as the commission condemned the alleged inhuman and degrading treatment of of passengers .

Title: Coalition of Niger Delta youths, stakeholders support Tinubu’s second-term bid
Summary: Coalition of Niger Delta Youth Stakeholders has thrown its weight behind the recent declaration by the Presidential Amnesty Programme Administrator, Dr. Dennis Otuaro, that the Niger Delta will support only President Bola Ahmed Tinubu in the 2027 general election .

Title: INEC seeks stronger collaboration with 3 Division to enhance National Democracy
Summary: Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) in Plateau State has called for enhanced cooperation with the 3 Division Nigerian Army and Operation Safe Haven (OPSH) to strengthen Nigeria’s democratic processes . The State Resident Electoral Commissioner (REC), Alhaji Muhammed Abubakar Sadiq, is the state resident Electoral Commissioner

Title: Lagos Assembly to hold public hearing on tenancy bill
Summary: Lagos State House of Assembly has hosted a public hearing on a new bill . The bill is titled ‘A bill for a law to regulate the relationship between landlords and tenants’

Title: GMI hails Seyi Tinubu’s philanthropy in northern Nigeria
Summary: Grassroots Mobilisation Initiative hails Seyi Tinubu's philanthropy in northern Nigeria . GMI noted that several communities are already benefiting from the philanthropy .

Title: FG approves N13bn compensation, $34m transformer procurement to boost power supply
Summary: FEC approves four major proposals from the Ministry of Power aimed at reforming and strengthening Nigeria’s national electricity grid . FEC approves N13bn compensation, $34m transformer procurement to boost power supply .

Title: FEC directs ministers to forward comprehensive lists of projects to BPP for scrutiny
Summary: FEC directs ministers to forward comprehensive lists of projects to Bureau of Public Procurement, BPP, for scrutiny and analysis for onward transmission to the President .

Title: Tinubu targets 7% growth rate by 2027, charges ministers on optimizing public savings
Summary: Tinubu targets 7% growth rate by 2027, charges ministers on optimizing public savings . Directs finance minister to review deductions, revenue retention practices .

Title: Arewa Youth Assembly hails Tinubu for Maida’s reappointment as NCC boss
Summary: The Arewa Youth Assembly congratulates Dr. Aminu Maida on his reappointment as Executive Vice Chairman/Chief Executive Officer of the Nigerian Communications Commission . President Bola Tinubu has announced the commission’s new board members .

Title: Kwam 1, Ibom Air incident: Ex-militant leader hails FG’s decision to withdraw case
Summary: Eshanekpe Israel, popularly known as Akpodoro, commended the Federal Government for withdrawing the criminal charges filed by the Federal Airports Authority of Nigeria (FAAN) against music star Wasiu Ayinde and Ms. Comfort Comfort .
